# @zcatalyst/cli-utils

Common utilities that are used in various components which are part of the ZCatalyst-CLI and other Dx tools.

| Name        | Description                                                           |
|-------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Env         | Contains basic env related utils                                      |
| Progress    | Used to display the Upload and download progress of a stream          |
| Throbber    | Module that facilitates the display of loaders in the terminal window |

### Source Access
This is an open source package. If you would like access to the complete source code repository, please contact us at support@zohocatalyst.com
